author: Adela Suliman
title: From vodka to soccer, campaigns to boycott Russia build momentum
description: A Canadian liquor board removed Russian vodka from shelves, while Poland's national soccer team refused to play a match in Russia.
content: The Newfoundland Labrador Liquor Corporation (NLC), which is responsible for importing, selling and distributing alcohol within the province, announced on Twitter that it would remove products of Rusâ€¦ [+5627 chars]
